FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`

) AS `t`

    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`

    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`

    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`

) AS `t`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`

    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`

) AS `t`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)

) AS `t`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id2`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy2`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate2`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy2`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate2`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId1`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted2`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy2`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate2`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name1`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug1`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `t`.`Id2`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`

) AS `t`

    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`

FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`

ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CategoryId`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`Date`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Details`, `t`.`DiscountRate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`InstallmentCount`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`Price`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`FileName`, `t`.`FileType`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p0`.`IsDeleted`, `p0`.`Slug`, `p1`.`ProductId`, `p1`.`SizeId`, `p1`.`IsDeleted`, `p1`.`Slug`, `t`.`CreatedBy1`, `t`.`CreatedDate1`, `t`.`DeletedBy1`, `t`.`DeletedDate1`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted1`, `t`.`ModifiedBy1`, `t`.`ModifiedDate1`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug0`
FROM (
    SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `i`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `i`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `i`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `i`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `i`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `i`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c`.`Id` AS `Id1`, `c`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy1`, `c`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate1`, `c`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy1`, `c`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate1`, `c`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted1`, `c`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy1`, `c`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate1`, `c`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Products` AS `p`
    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
    INNER JOIN `Categories` AS `c` ON `p`.`CategoryId` = `c`.`Id`
    WHERE (`p`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `ProductColors` AS `p0` ON `t`.`Id` = `p0`.`ProductId`
LEFT JOIN `ProductSizes` AS `p1` ON `t`.`Id` = `p1`.`ProductId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`Id1`, `p0`.`ProductId`, `p0`.`ColorId`, `p1`.`ProductId`

WHERE `p`.`CategoryId` IN ('d8c8e033-7caf-47b7-8c58-6634134a739c', '08627b13-7960-490c-a644-5df1c44112ed', '0acc6f61-9580-491a-be9a-834ee85f96cc') AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)

SELECT `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`
FROM `Products` AS `p`
WHERE `p`.`CategoryId` IN ('d8c8e033-7caf-47b7-8c58-6634134a739c', '08627b13-7960-490c-a644-5df1c44112ed', '0acc6f61-9580-491a-be9a-834ee85f96cc') AND NOT (`p`.`IsDeleted`)
ORDER BY `p`.`Id`
LIMIT @__p_2 OFFSET @__p_1

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`

WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)

FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`
